name: Deep light: OCEAN
description:
NOTE: You can play this game on the Internet browser, but I strongly recommend to install the game so your progress can be stored.

This game is a comedy with a sad Lore behind.

I can't tell much about this game: its a 2d plattaform game with enemies and bosses. It has some easter eggs that you can find.

I have to say that my main language is not the English, so if you find some typos, please let me know so I can fix them.

I hope you enjoy the game!

JUMP = SPACE

MOVE = A - D

RUN = SHIFT

HIT = LEFT MOUSE CLICK

You will be running almost all the time so the Shift key will be your best friend.

If you can't jump to a plattform try jumping and running at the same time. Everything has been tested multiple times, so the game is NOT impossible, it's just difficult sometimes..

If you want to unlock all levels, you can press F1 in the main menu and type the  cheat code: unlock.

If you want to reset the game data, type: restartgame.
